item.title: US strikes another vessel off Venezuela coast, killing six
item.description: President Trump said the vessel belonged to "narcoterrorists" and that it was "trafficking narcotics." US officials have not provided evidence to this...

item.title: Military says it has seized power in Madagascar after president moves to 'safe place'
item.description: The military promises elections within two years, but President Rajoelina insists he is still in charge.

item.title: Israel identifies bodies of first four dead hostages returned by Hamas
item.description: The first four deceased hostages to be returned are Guy Illouz, Bipin Joshi, Yossi Sharabi and Daniel Peretz.

item.title: French pair sentenced in Iran on spying charges
item.description: The defendants are believed to be couple Cecile Kohler and Jacques Paris, who were arrested in 2022.

item.title: Dâ€™Angelo, R&B Grammy-award winning singer, dies aged 51
item.description: The singer, who was also an acclaimed songwriter, was known for helping create the genre of neo-soul.
